T04sanss19u:3: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss19u:6: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati |
T04sanss19u:7: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:12: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:18: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:20: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:22: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:26: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:27: sarvasatvānāṃ kleśamalāt prakṣālayeyaṃ |sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:30: vāsanām apanayeyaṃ |sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām anekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ |mukhaṃ prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:32: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanss19u:38: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
T04sanss19u:39: nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam |
T04sanss19u:41: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya |
T04sanss19u:42: tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam |sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhyâiva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu |
T04sanss19u:45: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo-
T04sanss19u:47: dhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante ||corakāntāramadhyagatena
T04sanss19u:48: śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na
T04sanss19u:50: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvôtsṛṣṭakāyenâpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkārôpakaraṇena ca |
T04sanss19u:51: tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkārôpakaraṇāni
T04sanss19u:53: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na
T04sanss19u:55: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasâparāddhavyaṃ |
T04sanss19u:56: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati
T04sanss19u:57: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss19u:58: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre |
T04sanss19u:59: ete cânye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante ||pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatve-
T04sanss19u:63: tvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |tat kasmād dhetoḥ |
T04sanss19u:67: na bodhisatvena mahāsatvena saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |saced ahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ
T04sanss19u:69: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi |
T04sanss19u:70: aho vatâlpapuṇyâmī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante |
T04sanss19u:71: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nuttarāṃ
T04sanss19u:72: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante |
T04sanss19u:73: tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathâṣṭâṅgôpetapānīyalābhino
T04sanss19u:75: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti ||punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nôttrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |
T04sanss19u:77: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ bu-
T04sanss19u:79: ddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ
T04sanss19u:80: evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante |
T04sanss19u:82: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo yâivâbhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evâkāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati |
T04sanss19u:83: tad yathâpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate
T04sanss19u:84: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikâbhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti |
T04sanss19u:85: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadêti ||evam ayaṃ ... sarvâvasthāsu satvârthaḥ ... puṇyavṛrdhihetuḥ |
T04sanss19u:96: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati |
T04sanss19u:111: ime maitreya viṃśatir anuśaṃsêti ||āryaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ tv āha |
T04sanss19u:112: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ |
T04sanss19u:113: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyâpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt |
T04sanss19u:114: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇârādhitaḥ syāṃ |
T04sanss19u:115: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cârhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlama-
T04sanss19u:118: tat kiṃ manyase ānandâpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ |
T04sanss19u:122: ataḥ sânanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
T04sanss19u:123: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo
T04sanss19u:134: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati |
T04sanss19u:136: evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandânavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetânuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
T04sanss19u:137: nâitat sthānaṃ vidyatae iti ||kathaṃ dharmadānaṃ dātavyaṃ |
T04sanss19u:141: nu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā |
T04sanss19u:142: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśetâlīnacittaḥ ||sukhasthito
T04sanss19u:143: bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate |
T04sanss19u:144: udāraprajñapta karitvâsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe ||caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ |
T04sanss19u:145: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā ||
T04sanss19u:148: sudhautapādaś côpāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena câpi ||dharmâsane
T04sanss19u:149: tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekâgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan |
T04sanss19u:150: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś cô bhikṣunikās tathâiva ||kilāsitāś câpi vivarjayīta na câpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ |
T04sanss19u:151: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca
T04sanss19u:152: ||bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭântakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ |
T04sanss19u:153: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathâiva toṣayet na câpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet ||khŌüdyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathânnapŌünaṃ vastrŌüṇi śayyâsanacīvarŌüṇi |
T04sanss19u:154: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñape-
T04sanss19u:158: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā |
T04sanss19u:159: etac ca me sarvasukhôpadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke ||atrâivâha
T04sanss19u:160: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇâpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti ||
T04sanss19u:162: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt |
T04sanss19u:164: evaṃ tvaṃ*vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ |
T04sanss19u:165: kathaṃ mahâtmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā ||
T04sanss19u:166: sahasâiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ |
T04sanss19u:168: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān |
T04sanss19u:169: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ ||
T04sanss19u:170: bhaveyur yadi câlpêcchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T04sanss19u:171: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām ||
T04sanss19u:174: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ |
T04sanss19u:201: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmâsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārâbhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā |
T04sanss19u:202: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyêmāni mantrapadāny āmukhīkṛtya dharmasaṃkathā karaṇīyā |
T04sanss19u:203: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā
T04sanss19u:205: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty antarāyaṃ kartum iti ||atrâivâha
T04sanss19u:206: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti ||evaṃ dharmadānaṃ ||
T04sanss19u:210: tad yathâpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante |
T04sanss19u:211: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhārôpacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ |
T04sanss19u:216: vistaratas tu buddhaviṣayâiva ||atra câsyā yathôktāyāḥ śikṣāyāḥ |
T04sanss19u:218: smṛtyâtha saṃprajanyena yoniśaś cintanena ca ||tatrânutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyâiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātîty anena rakṣā ||utpannānāṃ
T04sanss19u:219: ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatîty anena śuddhiḥ |
T04sanss19u:220: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati |
T04sanss19u:221: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatîty ādi |
T04sanss19u:223: etāni ca nityam apramādâdhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt
T04sanss19u:225: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathâiva kṣāntiḥ |
T04sanss19u:226: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita |
T04sanss19u:230: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchila-
T04sanss19u:236: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanss19u:238: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanss19u:240: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ câdīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T04sanss19u:241: ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ ||punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyârakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad
T04sanss19u:243: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca tasyânulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ |
T04sanss19u:244: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati |
T04sanss19u:245: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
T04sanss19u:246: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati |
T04sanss19u:247: yasya guhyakâdhipate śraddhā câpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T04sanss19u:248: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakâdhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astîti
T04sanss19u:251: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi ||tathā atrâivâha |
T04sanss19u:255: yad yoniśaś câiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti ||āha
T04sanss19u:260: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyâstv apāratā |
T04sanss19u:261: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet ||tadduṣkhena na me bādhêty ato yadi na rakṣasi |
T04sanss19u:262: nâgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi ||aham eva tadâpîti mithyêyaṃ parikalpanā |
T04sanss19u:263: anyâiva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate ||anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ
T04sanss19u:264: yūnaḥ kiṃ vṛddhakāyasya sukhāya dhanasaṃcayaiḥ ||mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate
T04sanss19u:271: kāyaś cet pratimâkāraḥ pesībhasmasu nâsti saḥ ||sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ |
T04sanss19u:273: kāyêty ucyate na saḥ ||tatra cintâiva me nâsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān |
T04sanss19u:274: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā câiva dṛśyate ||
T04sanss19u:279: na guṇavyatirekeṇa pradhānaṃ vidyate yataḥ ||na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇâpi |
T04sanss19u:280: pratyekaṃ tryātmakās te 'pi śeṣaṃ nâikavidhaṃ jagat ||acetanaṃ ca vastrâdi tatsukhâdyātmakaṃ katham |
T04sanss19u:281: sukhâder na paṭṭôtpattiḥ paṭṭâdes tu sukhâdayaḥ |
T04sanss19u:282: paṭṭâdīnām ahetutvād abhāvas tatsukhaṃ kutaḥ ||tasmād āgamayuktibhyāṃ anityaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ |tad dhetuphalasaṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣatvān na sādhyate
T04sanss19u:283: ||svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā |
T04sanss19u:286: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ ||saṃtānaḥ samudŌüyaś ca paṅktisenâdivan mṛṣŌü
T04sanss19u:287: tatrâbhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate ||
T04sanss19u:290: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parâtmanoḥ ||ayuktam api ced etat
T04sanss19u:292: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ ||kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt |
T04sanss19u:293: jagadduṣkhaṃ nirūpyêdaṃ kṛpāduṣkhaṃ kathaṃ bahu ||evaṃ bhāvitasaṃtānāḥ paraduṣkhasamapriyāḥ
T04sanss19u:294: avīcīm avagāhante haṃsāḥ padmavanaṃ yathā ||satveṣu mucyamāneṣu ye te
T04sanss19u:296: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇâpy arasena kim ||
T04sanss19u:297: evaṃ parârthaṃ kṛtvâpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ |
T04sanss19u:307: puṇyaṃ pravartate tasmād anantaṃ satvadhātuvat ||ayaṃ sa mārgapravaraḥ kṣemânantasukhôtsavaḥ
T04sanss19u:314: parâtmaduṣkhaśāntyartham ātmâdīn sarvathôtsṛjet ||tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati |
T04sanss19u:315: pariṇāmavināśitvāt sa duṣkhajanako yataḥ ||loke duṣkhâgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet
T04sanss19u:316: samantād dahyamānasya nakhâdāhe 'pi kiṃ sukham ||ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ |
T04sanss19u:317: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svârtham utsṛjan ||
T04sanss19u:320: ātmatatvasmṛtiṃ kṛtvā pratītyôtpādacintayā ||yad bhayān nôtsṛjāmy etat tad evâdadato bhayaṃ
T04sanss19u:321: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ ||yadi ni-
T04sanss19u:324: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayâiva sā ||evam ātmānam utsṛjya sarvasatvârtham ācaret
T04sanss19u:327: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vôpayojayet ||svakāye parakāye vā yad
T04sanss19u:330: lokôpajīvyāt sattīrthād [[DOUBT]] bhujaṅgakuṇapêva ||puṇyakṣetram idaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃpatsasyamahāphalaṃ
T04sanss19u:331: sukhadurbhikṣasaṃtaptaṃ jagat saṃtarpayiṣyati ||lābhasatkārakāyâdi tyaktaṃ nanujane [[DOUBT]] mayā |
T04sanss19u:332: kopaḥ kasyârtham adyâpi mṛṣā vā tan mayôditam ||svârthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati
T04sanss19u:333: nirdayasyâpi kaḥ kopaḥ parârtho yadi naśyati ||
T04sanss19u:336: svāmy-asanena durnyastā nôpabhogyā bhavanti te ||cintayati pratīkāraṃ na ca svāmihitêcchayā
T04sanss19u:337: nâpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogârthaṃ nôpayāti ca ||anusmṛtyôpasmṛtyâitān
T04sanss19u:339: nānāviṣayadhātūnāṃ sārvêndriyamahāgadān ||vijñapya smārayitvâitān kruddhān apy upakāriṇaḥ
T04sanss19u:343: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ ||sarvaduścaritenâiṣāṃ
T04sanss19u:345: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān ||yāvad ākāśaniṣṭasya niṣṭhā lokasya saṃbhavet
T04sanss19u:350: kâiva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī |
T04sanss19u:351: taddoṣânuśayajño vā yathâtmagurur ātmanaḥ ||avirāgy- apalāyī ca karuṇāviṣayo 'pi vā |
T04sanss19u:352: nityasaṃnihitaś câpi śiṣyâtmasamaḥ kutaḥ ||kleśônmatto 'tha mohândhaḥ prapātabahule pathi
T04sanss19u:353: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ parâtmā ca sarvadā ||skhalitânveṣaṇaṃ tasmāt samānavyasanāj janāt
T04sanss19u:354: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvâdbhutaṃ mahat ||nâikena śakyam ādātuṃ mayā doṣamahôdadhiḥ
T04sanss19u:357: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ ||saṃgrāmo hi mamâikasya bahubhiḥ kleśaśatrubhiḥ
T04sanss19u:361: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā |
T04sanss19u:362: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt ||
T04sanss19u:371: viduṣā bālavapuṣā lokavismayakāriṇā ||mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat
T04sanss19u:383: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathâtyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyôpārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me |
T04sanss19u:384: bhavatu sukham anantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam ana-
